jot.ai.steeringBehaviours

Class Hide

  • java.lang.Object
    • jot.ai.steeringBehaviours.AbstractSteeringBehavior
      • jot.ai.steeringBehaviours.Hide

  • public class Hide
extends AbstractSteeringBehavior
    Class that implements Craig Reynolds hide steering behavior.
    Author:
    G. Amador & A. Gomes

      • hide

        protected org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D hide(Agent target,
                                                                           Iterator<GameObject> obstacles)
        The distance to each of these spots is determined. The vehicle then uses the arrive behavior to steer toward the closest. If no appropriate obstacles can be found, the vehicle evades the target.
        Parameters:
        target - to hide/evade from.
        obstacles - in the game world map.
        Returns:
        the steering force.

      • GetHidingPosition

        protected org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D GetHidingPosition(org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D posOb,
                                                                                        double radiusOb,
                                                                                        org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D posTarget)
        Determine a hiding spot for an obstacle.
        Parameters:
        posOb - location of an obstacle.
        radiusOb - radius of an obstacle.
        posTarget - from which we want to hide.
        Returns:
        a hiding spot for an obstacle.
